Name: Gym Simulator
About the game: Gym Simulator RPG 18+ The first ever Gym Simulator Extremely realistic FIRST PERSON GYM RPG , immersive first person gym interactions and real-time muscle growth. Features: Gameplay: -REAL TIME MUSCLE GROWTH . Watch your body transform as you train Talk with hot chicks and try to get laid -Exercises with dumbbells -Bench press, peck dec machine, pull machine - train on real gym equiment in first person view -Sit ups -Push ups -Run on thread mill -Chin up -Kick the boxing bag -Dialogues -NPCs treat you differently as per how rigged you are -Male showers&locker rooms -Great Stylized graphics This is a superior project that starts off in Early Access having an impressive gameplay abilities base.
